backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: expanding the memories gallery to 9 photos in a 3x3 grid, restructuring navigation from 6 to 5 pages by merging One Chance and Question pages, adding romantic message and heart animation on button click, and making the 'time' button move randomly when clicked.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing brief descriptions of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files for the romantic multi-page website.
frontend/index.css: Duplicate of frontend/src/index.css containing Tailwind directives and CSS custom properties for theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Documentation instructing users how to replace the 9 placeholder images (memory-1.jpg through memory-9.jpg) in the assets directory with personal photos.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with 5 routes (landing, memories, understanding, one-chance, final) wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing floating hearts background animation, router outlet, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution across all pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, using React Query for caching and automatic invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeartAnimation.ts: Custom hook providing triggerHearts function that creates and animates 20 floating heart emojis across the viewport for 5 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind directives, OKLCH color system for romantic pink/white theme, custom CSS variables, golden glow effects, floating heart animations, and responsive design utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component with necessary providers.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Final page component displaying a heartfelt message in Hinglish about choosing to stay together, with heart animation triggered on mount.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with a romantic greeting and call-to-action button that navigates to the memories page.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesPage.tsx: Displays a 3x3 grid of 9 memory photos with captions and navigation buttons to previous/next pages.
frontend/src/pages/OneChancePage.tsx: Interactive page with moving buttons, a mini yes/no game, and multiple conditional messages based on user interactions with heart animations.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionPage.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/UnderstandingPage.tsx: Displays apologetic and understanding messages in Hinglish with navigation buttons to previous and next pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (pink, gold, OKLCH colors), animations (float, fadeIn, glow), and extended theme settings including shadows and fonts.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a 5-page romantic website with pink/white theme, 9-photo gallery, interactive elements, and Hinglish content with architectural notes and image requirements.
